title: With narrow margins, Democrats debate best path to overcome headwinds
description:
Democratic policy analysts Bill Galston and Elaine Kamarck join Chuck to discuss their latest report, “The New Politics of Evasion: How Ignoring Swing Voters Could Reopen the Door for Donald Trump and Threaten American Democracy.”

Read the report here: 

https://www.progressivepolicy.org/publication/the-new-politics-of-evasion%20%5Bprogressivepolicy-org%5D/
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
